text: The Canadian Broadcasting Corporation (), (branded as CBC), is the Canadian public broadcaster for both radio and television. It broadcasts in English and French. The company was founded on 2 November 1936 in Ottawa, Canada. On November 2, 1936, CBC-Radio Canada was launched. ==CBC Stations== * CBCT Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island * CBLT Toronto, Ontario * CBWT Winnipeg, Manitoba * CBXT Edmonton, Alberta == References == == Other websites == * Category:1936 establishments in North America Category:1930s establishments in Canada
title: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
